steps.title: Check if the website loads
steps.description: We need to make sure the website opens in your browser without any errors
instructions: Open your web browser (Chrome, Firefox, or Safari)
Type the website address in the address bar
Press Enter to load the website
Wait for the page to fully load
steps.expected_outcome: The website should load completely with all images and text visible
steps.actual_outcome: The page loaded but the gallery images are broken and showing placeholder icons
steps.user_feedback:
I followed all the steps but when the page loaded, I noticed:
1. The main banner image loaded fine
2. The gallery section has 6 broken image icons
3. The rest of the page looks normal
4. Console shows 404 errors for gallery images
5. The image URLs point to /images/gallery/ but should be /assets/gallery/
steps.ai_response:
Based on your detailed feedback, I've identified the issue:

Problem: Image paths are incorrect (using /images/gallery/ instead of /assets/gallery/)

Proposed Fix:
1. Update all gallery image src attributes to use correct path
2. Add fallback images for missing assets
3. Implement lazy loading to improve performance
4. Add onerror handlers to gracefully handle missing images

Code changes needed:
- Update image paths in gallery.html
- Add fallback.jpg to assets folder
- Implement error handling in gallery.js

Would you like me to make these changes?

steps.title: Test the login button
steps.description: Let's check if the login button works properly
instructions: Find the 'Login' button on the page (usually at the top right)
Check if a login form appears
steps.expected_outcome: A login form with username and password fields should appear

steps.title: Verify the search feature
steps.description: Make sure the search box helps you find things
instructions: Find the search box on the page
Press Enter or click the search button
Look at the results that appear
steps.expected_outcome: Search results related to 'test' should appear on the page
steps.actual_outcome: Search box accepted input but no results appeared, page just refreshed
steps.user_feedback:
The search didn't work properly:
- I could type in the search box
- When I pressed Enter, the page refreshed
- No search results appeared
- The URL changed to include ?search=test
- But the page looks exactly the same
- No error messages shown
steps.ai_response:
I see the search functionality isn't properly connected. Here's what's happening:

Issue Analysis:
- Form is submitting (URL parameter added)
- But no search handler is processing the query
- Page refreshes without displaying results

Required Fixes:
1. Add search result container to HTML
2. Implement search handler in backend/JS
3. Connect search query to data source
4. Display results or 'no results' message

Quick Fix for Testing:
- Add preventDefault to form submission
- Implement client-side search simulation
- Display mock results for demonstration

This requires backend implementation to fully work.

feedback_log.feedback: Images are not loading in the gallery section

I followed all the steps but when the page loaded, I noticed:
1. The main banner image loaded fine
2. The gallery section has 6 broken image icons
3. The rest of the page looks normal
4. Console shows 404 errors for gallery images
5. The image URLs point to /images/gallery/ but should be /assets/gallery/

The search didn't work properly:
- I could type in the search box
- When I pressed Enter, the page refreshed
- No search results appeared
- The URL changed to include ?search=test
- But the page looks exactly the same
- No error messages shown

summary.session_notes: User provided excellent detailed feedback that clearly identified root causes. Gallery images issue is a simple path fix. Search feature needs backend implementation.
